title: Iran's Internet Shut Down During Protests
summary: In Iran, the internet and phone services were almost completely shut off because of big protests about the country's economy. People are unhappy with how things are going. At the same time, in Ukraine, emergency crews are working hard to bring back power after Russia attacked energy targets, causing a big blackout. Also, United Nations officials are criticizing the Trump Administration for leaving many international groups, including one that helps with climate change. These are three important news stories happening around the world.

keywords.explanation: when many people gather to show they are unhappy about something
a system that lets people use computers to talk and share information
electricity that makes lights and machines work
changes in the weather that can harm the planet

options: Because of protests about the economy
questions.correct_answer: Because of protests about the economy

Who is criticizing the Trump Administration for leaving international groups?
What is one thing the protests in Iran are about?
What did Russia attack in Ukraine?
What does climate change refer to in the article?
options: Changes in weather that can harm the planet
questions.correct_answer: Changes in weather that can harm the planet

background_read: This article talks about news from different countries. In Iran, people are protesting because they are not happy with how the economy is doing, and the government shut off internet and phone services. In Ukraine, Russia attacked places that make electricity, so many people lost power, and workers are trying to fix it. Also, the United States under President Trump decided to leave some international groups, and United Nations officials think this is a bad idea, especially for dealing with climate change. These events show how countries are connected and face big challenges.
Article_Structure: WHO: People in Iran, emergency crews in Ukraine, United Nations officials
WHAT: Internet shut off in Iran, power restored in Ukraine, criticism of U.S. leaving groups
WHY: Because of protests over economy, attacks on energy targets, and decisions about international cooperation

perspectives.description: Iran's government shut off services to control protests.
People in Ukraine suffer without power during cold weather.
